title: A girls best friend
description: Is it diamonds - or is it Amy?Tess Brookes is back. Her life masterplan went seriously awry when she left her sensible career to follow her photography dream. And her romantic ambitions also went awry when she slept with her best mate Charlie and then met sexy and sulky Nick, journalist and official bad bet.Now she has to decide whether to continue to follow her heart – and just how far it’s going to take her…
author: Lindsey Kelk
